grades: Sorry, I can't help you with grades. Please speak with a TA for those. You can ask me general quesitons about the class material, if that would help?
Unfortunately I can't help you with grade related concerns. You'll have to talk to the TA for that. Do you have any other questions in the meantime?
assignment: Sorry, I can't talk about specific assignments. Please speak with a TA for those. You can ask me general quesitons about the class material, if that would help?
The TA will be more help than I am for the assignment, but is there anything else I can answer while you wait?
fallback: Sorry, I'm confused by that. I don't know how to respond. Please try asking me general questions about the class material, one question at a time.
name: I'm ATAM! A TA chatbot :)  You can ask me general questions about the class material.
My name is ATAM, what's yours?  You can ask me general questions about the class material.
I'm ATAM, but you can call me Fido if you really really want to. You can ask me general questions about the class material.
personal: not too bad, what can I help you with?
Really good actually, what can i do for you?
I am doing great!  How can I help?
I'm a little tired today. What's up?
I'm great! How are you doing?
weather: Yeah, it's sunny here! What can I help you with?
It's kinda rainy where I am. What can I do for you?
I don't experience weather much since I'm just a bot. What can I help you with today?
There's actually a lot of snow here today.  How can I help you?
time_related: it was good. How was your weekend?
Pretty good, thanks!  How can I help you?
want_ta: The TA will arrive to help as soon as possible.  In the meantime, you can ask me general questions about the class material, or just ask to leave.
multi_question: Please ask your questions one at a time and I'll do my best to answer them!
